author: eli
msg: HADOOP-6928. Fix BooleanWritable comparator in 0.20. Contributed by Owen O'Malley and Johannes Zillmann.

author: gcrawford
msg: TRINIDAD-1683 client-side convertNumber causes loss of precision

This has caused some new issues, for example there's no numberconverter on the client even though 99% of the time it works just fine. Also, in cases where a client numberconverter is required there isn't one. I'm going to undo this fix and try to come up with something else.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-721. py: THttpClient ignores url parameters
Respect query string in THttpClient and generated remotes. Also, add an error message on unknown methods.
